name: Selang
description: The Selang is a Medium-sized fey creature characterized by its chaotic evil alignment, featuring a combination of high Strength and Charisma which it uses to influence and damage opponents. It has magical poison-coated weapons which enhance its lethality.
memorable: Its ability to play mystical melodies that influence enemies in combat makes it a unique and tactical foe.
goals: The Selang typically seeks to manipulate and harm adversaries through its abilities and combat prowess.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other fey creatures or as a servant of a more powerful fey lord.
environment: The Selang is often found in enchanted forests or locations steeped in magical energy.
strengths: Possesses immunities to acid and lightning damage, along with high damage potential through poison attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks, which can bypass its resistances.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with dagger or poison bolt, dealing significant poison damage combined with piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Alien Piping ability can influence a target's actions in combat through mystical melodies, possibly turning the tide of battle.
senses: It possesses a passive Perception score of 16, allowing it to detect hidden threats easily.
skills: Exceptional skills in Performance and Perception enable it to excel in social interactions and noticing details.
additional_information: Weapons coated with magical poison deal extra 3d6 poison damage.
High Charisma allows for effective manipulation of opponents.
Good mobility with a walking speed of 40 feet.
Mixed attack styles with ranged and melee options.
Utilizes tactical influence in combat through Alien Piping.
test_queries: fey creature that manipulates enemies with music
dangerous fey with high Charisma and poison attacks
medium-sized fey immune to acid and lightning
creature adept in performance and perception skills
